trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 25th 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsI was up early Christmas morning going for a walk. I heard a kind of pulsating hum. I looked up and saw a spherical object in the sky at about 2,000 feet? At first I thought it was an helicopter, but it just stayed there for at least 2 minutes ( I timed it after about 15 seconds becuase it was so unusual) and then it just flew straight up and out of sight in about 3 seconds.
Summary: An object appeared in the sky - hovered for about 2 1/2 minutes and left.
